steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"75c6j","text":"Combine   diluted SYBR Green Master Mix with   each of   forward and reverse primers per sample. Pipette this mixture into wells of 96-well qPCR plate. steps.section: qPCR
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cip9e","text":"Run qPCR in CFX96 Real-Time System (BioRad) using the following protocol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"250t0","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpfgf","text":"          95 ˚C   3 min      95 ˚C   10 sec   Repeat 39x    55 ˚C   10 sec      72˚C   30 sec      95 ˚C   10 sec      65 ˚C   5 sec      95 ˚C   5 sec    ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":155}],"data":{}},{"key":"es0tt","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","6_2":""},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":[200,194,"107"],"data":[["95 ˚C\u0026nbsp;","3 min",""],["95 ˚C\u0026nbsp;","10 sec\u0026nbsp;","Repeat 39x"],["55 ˚C\u0026nbsp;","10 sec",""],["72˚C\u0026nbsp;","30 sec",""],["95 ˚C\u0026nbsp;","10 sec",""],["65 ˚C\u0026nbsp;","5 sec",""],["95 ˚C\u0026nbsp;","5 sec",""]],"guid":"AF447A67DFFE11EBA3380A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{"C_2":[1,3]},"printData":[["95 ˚C\u0026nbsp;","3 min",""],["95 ˚C\u0026nbsp;","10 sec\u0026nbsp;","Repeat 39x"],["55 ˚C\u0026nbsp;","10 sec",""],["72˚C\u0026nbsp;","30 sec",""],["95 ˚C\u0026nbsp;","10 sec",""],["65 ˚C\u0026nbsp;","5 sec",""],["95 ˚C\u0026nbsp;","5 sec",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

steps.section: Data analysis
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1qs50","text":"Subtract the nuclear gene (hB2M) mean threshhold cycle (Ct) values from WCE samples from mtDNA amplicon of interest mean Ct values from Cyt samples to calculate ΔCt.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Data analysis
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a07i9","text":"Subtract the ΔCt of the control sample from each sample ΔCt to calculate the ΔΔCt value.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eaf7r","text":"WT mtDNA abundance was given a value of 1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
